bill_title: revise the distribution of certain sales tax revenues.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the distribution of certain sales tax revenues. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-52-5 be amended to read as follows: 10-52-5. All moneys received and collected on behalf of a particular political subdivision by the State Department of Revenue, pursuant to this chapter, shall be credited to a special municipal non-ad valorem tax fund which is hereby established in the state treasury and after deducting the amount of refunds made, the amounts necessary to defray the cost of collecting the tax, and the administrative expenses incident thereto, except the first one percent tax levied pursuant to § 10-52-2, shall be paid within thirty days after collection to the municipality entitled thereto. Section 2. That chapter 10-52 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Department of Revenue shall remit the money from the first one percent levied pursuant to § 10-52-2 to each municipality levying the tax based on each municipality's pro rata share of population of the municipalities levying the tax as determined by the most recent data from the United States Census Bureau.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
